consumed.map: function (doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'allotment_consumption' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.classification, doc.pvt_created], doc.seconds); }

consumed_by_callid.map: function (doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'allotment_consumption' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.call_id, doc.seconds);}
